name: rc-subscription-demo
description: Easy way for developers to stand up an application to watch for all event types on all extensions in their RingCentral accounts

RC_ENV.description: Will this be operating with a RingCentral Sandbox or Production account? accepts either: 'sandbox' or 'production'

RC_APP_KEY.description: Your RingCentral Application Key from the Developer Portal

RC_APP_SECRET.description: Your RingCentral Application Secret from the Developer Portal

RC_USERNAME.description: Your RingCentral Account Administrative Username (phone number). Expected format: [countryCode][numberWithoutSpecialCharactersParensOrHyphens], example: 12345678901

RC_PASSWORD.description: Your RingCentral Account Administrative User Password

RC_EXTENSION.description: Your RingCentral Account Administrative User Extension Number

RC_CACHE_PREFIX.description: The cache prefix to use if you modify the source code to implement multiple instances of the SDK for different subscriptions across accounts

EXTENSIONS_PER_PAGE.description: Number of Extensions to request per page, default number is optimal value for loading speed and performance. Lower numbers boot faster.

SUBSCRIBE_TO_EXTENSION_EVENTS.description: Subscribe to status events for extensions? (accepts: true -or- false)

SUBSCRIBE_TO_PRESENCE_EVENTS.description: Subscribe to presence events for extensions (uses detailedTelephonyStatus and aggregated set to true)? (accepts: true -or- false)

SUBSCRIBE_TO_MESSAGE_STORE_EVENTS.description: Subscribe to message store events for extensions? (accepts: true -or- false)

SUBSCRIBE_TO_PRESENCE_LINE_EVENTS.description: Subscribe to presence line events for extensions? (accepts: true -or- false)

SUBSCRIBE_TO_INSTANT_MESSAGE_EVENTS.description: Subscribe to instant message (sms) events for extensions? (accepts: true -or- false)
